name: TrickOrTreatOr
description:
Gather candy and sacrifice it to the evil spider spirit to extend your "life". 
Candy can be picked up at houses when wearing a new mask.
Time speeds up over time.

Can you beat your friends at Trick or treat?

Special thanks to:

Music by: HorrorPen
Background art: Alekei
SoundFX: bart

Spider art: My children.
